data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Udupi, Karnataka, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Udupi, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Udupi, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Udupi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 12,951 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Father, I pray that the Bedar (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bedar (Hindu traditions) people know you.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Udupi, Karnataka, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Udupi, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Udupi, Karnataka, India. Please, stir the 12,951 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: Udupi
location.people_groups_list: Mundala, Bedar Kakamundi, Amma Kodaga, Vallan, Vakkaliga Gangadikara
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mundala (28,000), Bedar Kakamundi (99,000), Amma Kodaga (2,000), Vallan (900), Vakkaliga Gangadikara (535,000)
